# Table Test

Simple table with alignments:

| Name | Age | City |
|:-----|:---:|-----:|
| Alice | 25 | Tokyo |
| Bob | 30 | Osaka |

---

# Multiple Tables

First table:

| Item | Price |
|------|-------|
| Apple | $1.00 |
| Banana | $0.50 |

Second table:

| Language | Year |
|----------|------|
| Go | 2009 |
| Rust | 2010 |

---

# Table with Complex Content

| Feature | **Bold** | *Italic* | `Code` |
|---------|----------|----------|--------|
| Text | **Important** | *Emphasis* | `function()` |
| Links | [Google](https://google.com) | *Link* | `var x = 1` |
